## Description {#details}

Lowering for an <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> ELF32 object file.

Definition at line 17 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/avrtargetobjectfile-h">AVRTargetObjectFile.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### Initialize() {#aea43cdda6a483d7a93fc2adbb0d3297c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::AVRTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/avrtargetobjectfile-h/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/avrtargetobjectfile-h">AVRTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/avrtargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/avrtargetobjectfile-cpp">AVRTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
